title: The 2-categorical S-matrix of a braided fusion 1-category is a character table
summary: The semisimple module categories over a braided fusion category $\mathcal{C}$ form a connected fusion 2-category $\text{Mod}(\mathcal{C})$. Its Drinfeld center $\mathcal{Z}(\text{Mod}(\mathcal{C}))$ is a braided fusion 2-category. To any braided fusion 2-category, Johnson-Freyd and Reutter arXiv:2105.15167v3 [math.QA] have associated a matrix-valued invariant, the 2-categorical $S$-matrix. In this short note we investigate this matrix of $\mathcal{Z}(\text{Mod}(\mathcal{C}))$ as an invariant for the braided fusion 1-category $\mathcal{C}$ and show that it reduces to the character table of the Müger center of $\mathcal{C}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了半单模范畴中心化子的2-范畴S矩阵，发现其约化为原始范畴Müger中心的特征表
AI.motivation: 研究半单模范畴中心化子的2-范畴S矩阵作为原始范畴不变量的性质，探索高阶范畴理论在传统范畴论中的应用
AI.method: 利用Johnson-Freyd和Reutter提出的2-范畴S矩阵理论，计算半单模范畴中心化子的S矩阵，分析其与原始范畴Müger中心的关系
AI.result: 证明了半单模范畴中心化子的2-范畴S矩阵约化为原始范畴Müger中心的特征表，建立了高阶范畴不变量与传统不变量的联系
AI.conclusion: 高阶范畴理论中的2-范畴S矩阵可以简化为传统范畴论中的已知不变量，为理解高阶范畴结构提供了新视角

title: The properad of quadratic Poisson structures is Koszul
summary:
In this paper, we suggest a sufficient condition on the properadic envelope of a quadratic dioperad to be Koszul in terms of twisted associative algebras.
  As a particular new example, we show that the properad of quadratic Poisson structures is Koszul.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了二次dioperad的properadic包络为Koszul的充分条件，并以此证明了二次Poisson结构的properad是Koszul的
AI.motivation: 研究二次dioperad的properadic包络何时具有Koszul性质，为理解相关代数结构的同调性质提供理论框架
AI.method: 通过扭曲结合代数的方法，建立了二次dioperad的properadic包络为Koszul的充分条件
AI.result: 证明了二次Poisson结构的properad是Koszul的，这是一个新的具体例子
AI.conclusion: 提出的充分条件为判断properadic包络的Koszul性质提供了有效工具，并成功应用于Poisson结构的研究

title: Double Hall-Littlewood symmetric polynomials
summary: We establish a ring isomorphism between the derived Hall algebra of the Jordan quiver and the ring of double symmetric functions (i.e., the ring of symmetric polynomials in two sets of countably many variables, invariant under the respective actions of their symmetric groups) with a parameter $t$. This isomorphism maps the derived Hall basis (the natural basis of the derived Hall algebra) to a class of double Hall-Littlewood (HL) symmetric functions, which are formulated via raising and lowering operators. These double HL functions are parameterized by bipartitions; they reduce to the classical HL functions when one of the partitions is empty, and specialize to Schur Laurent symmetric functions at $t = 0$. We also derive the Pieri rules for these double HL functions. Additionally, we obtain several natural generating functions for the derived Hall algebra as well as their transition relations, which can be transferred to the ring of double symmetric functions via the established ring isomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了Jordan箭图的导出Hall代数与双对称函数环之间的环同构，将导出Hall基映射到一类双Hall-Littlewood对称函数，并推导了这些函数的Pieri规则。
AI.motivation: 研究Jordan箭图的导出Hall代数与对称函数理论之间的联系，探索导出Hall代数在双对称函数环中的具体实现，建立两个数学结构之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 建立Jordan箭图的导出Hall代数与双对称函数环之间的环同构，通过提升和下降算子构造双Hall-Littlewood对称函数，推导Pieri规则，并研究生成函数及其转换关系。
AI.result: 成功建立了导出Hall代数与双对称函数环的环同构，将导出Hall基映射到由双分割参数化的双Hall-Littlewood对称函数，推导了这些函数的Pieri规则，并获得了导出Hall代数的多个自然生成函数及其转换关系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了导出Hall代数与双对称函数理论之间的深刻联系，为理解导出Hall代数提供了新的对称函数视角，并将导出Hall代数的结果转化为双对称函数环中的相应结果。

title: Noncommutative Minkowski integral inequality and a unitary categorification criterion for fusion rings
summary: We prove a noncommutative analogue of Minkowski's integral inequality for commuting squares of tracial von Neumann algebras. The inequality implies a necessary condition for a quadruple of graphs to be realized as inclusion graphs of a commuting square of multi-matrix algebras. As a corollary, we obtain a unitary categorification criterion for based rings, in particular, fusion rings.

AI.tldr: 证明了非交换Minkowski积分不等式在迹von Neumann代数交换方上的推广，给出了四重图作为多矩阵代数交换方包含图的必要条件，并得到了基于环（特别是融合环）的酉范畴化判据。
AI.motivation: 研究非交换分析中的积分不等式，特别是将经典的Minkowski积分不等式推广到非交换框架，这对于理解算子代数和量子信息理论中的结构有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用迹von Neumann代数和交换方的理论框架，证明了一个非交换版本的Minkowski积分不等式，并将其应用于多矩阵代数交换方的包含图分析。
AI.result: 成功证明了非交换Minkowski不等式，得到了四重图作为多矩阵代数交换方包含图的必要条件，并推导出基于环（特别是融合环）的酉范畴化判据。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了非交换分析中的重要不等式，为研究算子代数结构和量子范畴理论提供了新的工具和判据，特别在融合环的酉范畴化问题上取得了进展。

title: iCanonical basis arising from quasi-split rank one iquantum group
summary: We compute icanonical basis of the quasi-split rank one modified iquantum group, by obtaining explicit transition matrices among the icanonical basis, monomial basis, and standardized canonical basis; all these bases can be naturally categorified. These transition matrices follow from their counterparts computed in this paper among the icanonical basis, monomial basis, and canonical basis on simple finite-dimensional modules of quantum $\mathfrak{sl}_3$.

AI.tldr: 计算拟分裂秩一修正量子群的icanonical基，通过获得icanonical基、单项式基和标准化canonical基之间的显式转移矩阵；所有这些基都可以自然范畴化。这些转移矩阵源于本文在量子𝔰𝔩₃的简单有限维模上计算的icanonical基、单项式基和canonical基之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究量子群表示理论中的基结构，特别是拟分裂秩一修正量子群的icanonical基，旨在建立不同基之间的显式关系，为范畴化提供基础。
AI.method: 通过计算量子𝔰𝔩₃的简单有限维模上的icanonical基、单项式基和canonical基之间的显式转移矩阵，然后将这些结果推广到拟分裂秩一修正量子群的情况。
AI.result: 获得了拟分裂秩一修正量子群的icanonical基、单项式基和标准化canonical基之间的显式转移矩阵，证明了所有这些基都可以自然范畴化。
AI.conclusion: 成功计算了拟分裂秩一修正量子群的icanonical基，建立了不同基之间的显式转换关系，为量子群表示理论的范畴化研究提供了重要工具和基础。

title: Semi-infinite Lakshmibai--Seshadri paths and level-zero extremal weight modules over twisted quantum affine algebras
summary: In this paper, we study level-zero extremal weight modules over twisted quantum affine algebras. To this end, we introduce semi-infinite Lakshmibai--Seshadri paths associated with a level-zero dominant integral weight $λ$. We then show that the set $\tfrac{\infty}{2}\mathrm{LS}(λ)$ of semi-infinite LS paths of shape $λ$ is isomorphic, as a crystal, to the crystal basis $\mathcal{B}(λ)$ of the corresponding level-zero extremal weight module $V(λ)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了扭曲量子仿射代数的level-zero极值权模，通过引入半无限LS路径建立了与晶体基的对应关系
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲量子仿射代数的level-zero极值权模的结构，建立其与半无限LS路径的对应关系，为理解这类代数表示提供新的几何组合工具
AI.method: 引入与level-zero主导整权λ相关的半无限Lakshmibai-Seshadri路径，证明半无限LS路径集合作为晶体与对应level-zero极值权模的晶体基同构
AI.result: 证明了半无限LS路径集合∞/2LS(λ)作为晶体与level-zero极值权模V(λ)的晶体基B(λ)同构
AI.conclusion: 通过半无限LS路径成功建立了扭曲量子仿射代数的level-zero极值权模的晶体基的几何组合描述，为相关表示论研究提供了新工具

title: Cofiniteness and $P(z)$-tensor product bifunctors in orbifold theories associated to abelian but not-necessarily-finite groups
summary: Let $V$ be a Möbius vertex algebra and $G$ an abelian group of automorphisms of $V$. We construct $P(z)$-tensor product bifunctors for the category of $C_{n}$-cofinite grading-restricted generalized $g$-twisted $V$-modules (without $g$-actions) for $g\in G$ and the category of $C_{n}$-cofinite grading-restricted generalized $g$-twisted $V$-modules with $G$-actions for $g\in G$. In this paper, an automorphism $g$ of $V$ can be of infinite order and does not have to act semisimply on $V$, and the group $G$ can be an infinite abelian group containing nonsemisimple automorphisms of $V$.

AI.tldr: 该论文为Möbius顶点代数的扭曲模范畴构造了P(z)-张量积双函子，适用于无限阶非半单自同构和无限阿贝尔群的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究Möbius顶点代数在一般自同构群作用下的扭曲模范畴的张量积结构，特别是处理无限阶非半单自同构和无限阿贝尔群的情况，这些情况在现有文献中尚未得到充分研究。
AI.method: 构造P(z)-张量积双函子：对于g∈G，为Cn-余有限分级限制广义g-扭曲V-模（无g作用）的范畴，以及带有G作用的Cn-余有限分级限制广义g-扭曲V-模的范畴分别构造张量积双函子。
AI.result: 成功构造了P(z)-张量积双函子，这些函子适用于包含无限阶非半单自同构的无限阿贝尔群G，扩展了顶点代数扭曲模范畴的张量积理论。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为Möbius顶点代数的扭曲模范畴建立了更一般的张量积理论框架，能够处理更广泛的自同构群结构，包括无限阶和非半单的情况。

title: Topological quantum color code model on infinite lattice
summary: The color code model is a crucial instance of a Calderbank--Shor--Steane (CSS)-type topological quantum error-correcting code, which notably supports transversal implementation of the full Clifford group. Its robustness against local noise is rooted in the structure of its topological excitations. From the perspective of quantum phases of matter, it is essential to understand these excitations in the thermodynamic limit. In this work, we analyze the color code model on an infinite lattice within the quasi-local $C^{*}$-algebra framework, using a cone-localized Doplicher-Haag-Roberts (DHR) analysis. We classify its irreducible anyon superselection sectors and construct explicit string operators that generate anyonic excitations from the ground state. We further examine the fusion and braiding properties of these excitations. Our results show that the topological order of the color code is described by $\mathsf{Rep}(D(\mathbb{Z}_2 \times \mathbb{Z}_2)) \simeq \mathsf{Rep}(D(\mathbb{Z}_2)) \boxtimes \mathsf{Rep}(D(\mathbb{Z}_2))$, which is equivalent to a double layer of the toric code and consistent with established analyses on finite lattices.

AI.tldr: 本文在无限格点上分析颜色码模型，使用准局部C*代数框架和锥局域DHR分析，分类了不可约任意子超选择扇区，构造了产生任意子激发的显式弦算符，并研究了其融合和编织性质。
AI.motivation: 颜色码模型是CSS型拓扑量子纠错码的重要实例，支持Clifford群的横向实现。从量子物质相的角度，需要在热力学极限下理解其激发结构，这对于理解拓扑序至关重要。
AI.method: 在无限格点上使用准局部C*代数框架，采用锥局域Doplicher-Haag-Roberts (DHR)分析方法，分类不可约任意子超选择扇区，构造显式弦算符来产生任意子激发。
AI.result: 颜色码的拓扑序由𝖱𝖾𝗉(D(ℤ₂×ℤ₂)) ≃ 𝖱𝖾𝗉(D(ℤ₂)) ⊠ 𝖱𝖾𝗉(D(ℤ₂))描述，这等价于双层环面码，与有限格点上的已有分析一致。
AI.conclusion: 通过无限格点上的严格分析，确认了颜色码的拓扑序结构，为理解其在热力学极限下的激发性质提供了理论基础，并与有限格点结果一致。

title: Skew brace extensions, second cohomology and complements
summary: We study extensions and second cohomology of skew left braces via the natural semi-direct products associated with the skew left braces. Let $0 \to I \to E \to H \to 0$ be a skew brace extension and $Λ_H$ denote the natural semi-direct products associated with the skew left brace $H$. We establish a group homomorphism from ${\rm H}_{Sb}^2(H, I)$ into ${\rm H}_{Gp}^2(Λ_H, I \times I)$, which turns out to be an embedding when $I \le {\rm Soc}(E)$. In particular the Schur multiplier of a skew left braces $H$ embeds into the Schur multiplier of the group $Λ_H$. Analog of the Schur-Zassenhaus theorem is established for skew left braces in several specific cases. We introduce a concept called minimal extensions (which stay at the extreme end of split extensions) of skew left braces and derive many fundamental results. Several reduction results for split extensions of finite skew left braces by abelian groups (viewed as trivial left braces) are obtained.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过自然半直积研究斜左brace的扩张与第二上同调，建立了斜左brace上同调群到群上同调群的嵌入映射，并探讨了斜左brace的Schur乘子、分裂扩张和极小扩张等理论。
AI.motivation: 研究斜左brace的扩张理论和上同调性质，通过自然半直积建立斜左brace与群理论之间的联系，为斜左brace的分类和结构分析提供理论工具。
AI.method: 利用斜左brace的自然半直积Λ_H，建立从斜左brace第二上同调群H_{Sb}^2(H, I)到群第二上同调群H_{Gp}^2(Λ_H, I × I)的群同态映射，并证明当I ≤ Soc(E)时该映射是嵌入。同时引入极小扩张概念，研究分裂扩张的约化结果。
AI.result: 证明了斜左brace的Schur乘子可以嵌入到其自然半直积群的Schur乘子中。建立了斜左brace的Schur-Zassenhaus定理的类似结果。引入了极小扩张概念并得到基本性质。获得了有限斜左brace通过阿贝尔群（视为平凡左brace）的分裂扩张的多个约化结果。
AI.conclusion: 通过自然半直积方法，成功建立了斜左brace扩张理论与群上同调理论之间的联系，为斜左brace的结构和分类问题提供了新的工具和视角，特别是在上同调嵌入和分裂扩张约化方面取得了重要进展。

title: Deformation rigidity of some simple affine VOAs
summary: In this paper, we prove that simple affine vertex operator algebras with positive integral levels admit only trivial first-order deformations. Therefore, the deformation rigidity conjecture of strongly rational vertex operator algebras holds for these cases. We also show that the same holds simple affine vertex operator algebra of $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ at the non-integral admissible level $-4/3$. Therefore, neither $C_2$-cofiniteness nor rationality is a necessary condition for deformation rigidity of VOAs. We conjecture that the same should hold for every simple affine VOA that does not coincide with the corresponding universal affine VOA.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了具有正积分水平的简单仿射顶点算子代数仅存在平凡的一阶形变，验证了强有理顶点算子代数的形变刚性猜想。同时证明了非积分容许水平-4/3的𝔰𝔩₂简单仿射顶点算子代数也具有同样性质，表明C₂-余有限性和有理性都不是顶点算子代数形变刚性的必要条件。
AI.motivation: 研究顶点算子代数（VOAs）的形变刚性，特别是验证强有理顶点算子代数的形变刚性猜想是否成立。同时探索形变刚性的必要条件，检验C₂-余有限性和有理性是否是该性质的必需条件。
AI.method: 通过数学证明的方法，分析简单仿射顶点算子代数的一阶形变。首先证明具有正积分水平的简单仿射顶点算子代数仅存在平凡一阶形变，然后扩展到非积分容许水平-4/3的𝔰𝔩₂简单仿射顶点算子代数。
AI.result:
1. 具有正积分水平的简单仿射顶点算子代数仅存在平凡的一阶形变，验证了形变刚性猜想在这些情况下的正确性。
2. 非积分容许水平-4/3的𝔰𝔩₂简单仿射顶点算子代数也具有同样的形变刚性性质。
3. 证明了C₂-余有限性和有理性都不是顶点算子代数形变刚性的必要条件。
AI.conclusion: 该研究验证了强有理顶点算子代数的形变刚性猜想在简单仿射顶点算子代数情况下的正确性，并揭示了形变刚性的条件比预期的更广泛。作者推测这一性质应适用于所有不与相应通用仿射顶点算子代数重合的简单仿射顶点算子代数。

title: Weyl Mutations in Quiver Yangians
summary: The problem of solving non-linear equations would be considerably simplified by a possibility to convert known solutions into the new ones. This could seem an element of art, but in the context of ADHM-like equations describing quiver varieties there is a systematic approach. In this note we study moduli spaces and dualities of quiver gauge theories associated to effective dynamics of D-branes compactified on Calabi-Yau resolutions. We concentrate on a subfamily of quivers $\mathfrak{Q}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ covering Dynkin diagrams for simple Lie algebras $\mathfrak{g}$, where the respective BPS algebra is expected to be the Yangian algebra $Y(\mathfrak{g})$. For Yangians labeled by quivers their representations are described by solutions of ADHM-like equations. As quivers substitute Dynkin diagrams a generalization of the Weyl group $\mathcal{W}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ acts on the ADHM solutions. Here we work with the case $\mathfrak{g}=\mathfrak{sl}_{n+1}$ and treat this group as a group of electro-magnetic Seiberg-like dualities (we call them Weyl mutations) on the respective quiver gauge theories. We lift it to the case of higher representations associated to rectangular Young diagrams. An action of Weyl mutations on the BPS Yangian algebra is also discussed.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究通过ADHM-like方程描述quiver规范理论模空间，利用Weyl群作用（称为Weyl突变）将已知解转化为新解，特别关注sl_{n+1}代数对应的quiver和矩形杨图表示。
AI.motivation: 非线性方程求解通常很困难，如果能将已知解转化为新解会大大简化问题。在描述quiver簇的ADHM-like方程背景下，存在系统性的方法来实现这种转化。
AI.method: 研究D-膜在Calabi-Yau紧化上的有效动力学相关的quiver规范理论模空间和对偶性。重点关注覆盖简单李代数Dynkin图的quiver子族Q_g，其中BPS代数是Yangian代数Y(g)。将Weyl群推广为电-磁Seiberg-like对偶群（称为Weyl突变），作用于ADHM解，并提升到矩形杨图的高阶表示。
AI.result: 建立了Weyl群作用（Weyl突变）作为quiver规范理论对偶变换的系统框架，能够将ADHM-like方程的已知解转化为新解，并讨论了Weyl突变对BPS Yangian代数的作用。
AI.conclusion: 通过将Weyl群推广为电-磁对偶变换，为非线性ADHM-like方程的求解提供了系统方法，能够将已知解转化为新解，这在quiver规范理论和BPS代数研究中具有重要意义。

title: Spectral Fusion Deformations for Locally Compact Quantum Groups
comment: Withdrawn by the author due to (i) incorrect spectral assumptions: the algebraic spectral core defined via point isotypic components need not be dense outside discrete/Peter -- Weyl-type settings, and (ii) a flaw in the deformation mechanism whereby the proposed 3-cocycle deformation collapses to a "lazy" 2-cocycle and does not yield a genuine associativity deformation in the stated generality
summary:
We develop a deformation framework for $C^*$-algebras equipped with a coaction of a locally compact quantum group, formulated intrinsically at the level of spectral subspaces determined by the coaction. The construction is defined algebraically on a finite spectral core and extended by continuity to a natural Fréchet $*$-algebra completion under mild analytic regularity assumptions.
  Deformations are governed by scalar fusion data assigning phases to fusion channels of irreducible corepresentations. Associativity and $*$-compatibility are characterized by explicit algebraic identities. The framework recovers a range of known deformation procedures, including Rieffel, Kasprzak, and Drinfeld-type constructions, and also yields genuinely new deformations that do not arise from dual $2$--cocycles or crossed-product methods.
  At the $C^*$-level, we identify a minimal reduced setting in which the deformed algebra admits a canonical completion, formulated in terms of boundedness of the deformed left regular action on the Haar--GNS space. This separates algebraic coherence from analytic implementability and clarifies the precise role of higher-order fusion data in deformation theory for locally compact quantum groups. In particular, the framework exhibits explicit associator-level deformations governed by fusion $3$--cocycles that cannot arise from any dual $2$--cocycle or crossed-product construction.

AI.tldr: 本文为配备局部紧量子群余作用的C*-代数开发了一个变形框架，该框架在由余作用确定的光谱子空间层面上内在地表述。变形由标量融合数据控制，恢复了包括Rieffel、Kasprzak和Drinfeld型构造在内的已知变形程序，并产生了不从对偶2-上循环或交叉积方法产生的新变形。
AI.motivation: 为配备局部紧量子群余作用的C*-代数开发一个统一的变形框架，该框架能够涵盖已知的变形构造（如Rieffel、Kasprzak和Drinfeld型变形），同时产生不从对偶2-上循环或交叉积方法产生的新变形，从而澄清高阶融合数据在局部紧量子群变形理论中的精确作用。
AI.method: 在由余作用确定的光谱子空间层面上内在地表述变形框架，首先在有限光谱核上代数地定义构造，然后在温和解析正则性假设下通过连续性扩展到自然的Fréchet *-代数完备化。变形由标量融合数据控制，这些数据将相位分配给不可约余表示的融合通道。在C*-代数层面上，识别了一个最小约化设置，其中变形代数允许规范完备化，这是通过变形左正则作用在Haar-GNS空间上的有界性来表述的。
AI.result: 该框架恢复了包括Rieffel、Kasprzak和Drinfeld型构造在内的已知变形程序，并产生了不从对偶2-上循环或交叉积方法产生的新变形。特别地，该框架展示了由融合3-上循环控制的显式结合子级变形，这些变形不能从任何对偶2-上循环或交叉积构造中产生。
AI.conclusion: 本文为配备局部紧量子群余作用的C*-代数开发了一个统一的变形框架，该框架分离了代数相干性和解析可实现性，并澄清了高阶融合数据在局部紧量子群变形理论中的精确作用。该框架不仅涵盖了已知的变形构造，还产生了新的变形类型，特别是由融合3-上循环控制的结合子级变形，这些变形不能从对偶2-上循环或交叉积方法中产生。

title: A relationship between the Kauffman bracket skein algebras and Roger-Yang skein algebras of some small surfaces
summary: We calculate the Roger-Yang skein algebra of the annulus with two interior punctures, $ \mathcal S^{RY}(Σ_{0, 2, 2})$, and show there is a surjective homomorphism from this algebra to the Kauffman bracket skein algebra of the closed torus. Using this homomorphism, we characterize the irreducible, finite-dimensional representations of $ \mathcal S^{RY}(Σ_{0, 2, 2})$, showing that they can be described by certain complex data and that the correspondence is unique if certain polynomial conditions are satisfied. We also use the relationship with the skein algebra of the torus to compute structural constants for a bracelets basis for $ \mathcal S^{RY}(Σ_{0, 2, 2})$, giving evidence for positivity.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了带两个内部穿孔的环面的Roger-Yang skein代数，并建立了该代数与闭环面Kauffman括号skein代数之间的满同态关系，利用此关系刻画了该代数的不可约有限维表示，并计算了bracelets基的结构常数。
AI.motivation: 研究Roger-Yang skein代数在带穿孔曲面上的表示理论，特别是建立与经典Kauffman括号skein代数的联系，以更好地理解这些代数的表示结构和代数性质。
AI.method: 1. 计算带两个内部穿孔的环面Σ_{0,2,2}的Roger-Yang skein代数；2. 构造从该代数到闭环面Kauffman括号skein代数的满同态；3. 利用这个同态关系刻画Roger-Yang skein代数的不可约有限维表示；4. 计算bracelets基的结构常数。
AI.result: 1. 成功计算了𝒮^{RY}(Σ_{0,2,2})的具体结构；2. 建立了到闭环面skein代数的满同态；3. 完全刻画了Roger-Yang skein代数的不可约有限维表示，表明它们可由特定复数数据描述，且在满足多项式条件时对应关系唯一；4. 计算了bracelets基的结构常数，为正性猜想提供了证据。
AI.conclusion: 通过建立Roger-Yang skein代数与经典Kauffman括号skein代数之间的联系，本文成功刻画了带穿孔曲面skein代数的表示理论，并为相关代数的结构研究提供了新工具和见解，特别是为正性猜想提供了支持证据。

title: Denominators of R-matrices, higher Dorey's rules and a generalization of T-systems for quantum affine algebras
comment: This paper is a thoroughly revised version of our previous work [Simplicity of tensor products of Kirillov Reshetikhin modules; nonexceptional affine and G types] (arXiv 1910.10347). While main results are similar, the proofs are largely new, several earlier conjectures are now proved, and additional new results are obtained. The previous paper is withdrawn
summary: We construct a higher level analogue of Dorey's rule, which describe certain surjective morphisms between Kirillov--Reshetikhin (KR) modules over quantum affine algebras. Building on this, we establish a generalized T-system of short exact sequences and prove the denominator formula between KR modules in all nonexceptional types, except with only mild ambiguities persisting in type $C_n^{(1)}$. As a consequence, we can completely classify when a tensor product of KR modules is simple. These results have further applications to Schur positivity statements, quiver Hecke algebras, and the recently introduced $\mathfrak{d}$-invariants in monoidal categories over quantum affine algebras and quiver Hecke algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了量子仿射代数中Kirillov-Reshetikhin模的高阶Dorey规则，建立了广义T-系统，证明了分母公式，并完全分类了KR模张量积的简单性。
AI.motivation: 研究量子仿射代数中Kirillov-Reshetikhin模之间的映射关系，特别是要建立高阶的Dorey规则，以更好地理解这些模的结构和性质。
AI.method: 构造了高阶Dorey规则，建立了广义T-系统的短正合序列，证明了除C_n^(1)型外所有非例外类型的分母公式，并利用这些结果分类KR模张量积的简单性。
AI.result: 成功构建了高阶Dorey规则，建立了广义T-系统，证明了除C_n^(1)型外所有非例外类型的分母公式，完全分类了KR模张量积的简单性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为量子仿射代数和quiver Hecke代数中的KR模理论提供了重要进展，结果可应用于Schur正性陈述、quiver Hecke代数以及新引入的𝔡-不变量的研究。

title: The Conjecture of Dixmier for the first Weyl algebra is true
comment: 25 p; v2: minor changes; V3: improved exposition, more details to the proof added, 34 p; V4: significantly improved version: investigation of solutions to the string equation is added, 67 p; V5: extended introduction, more comments and references added, calculations at the last stage of the proof are simplified, some typos fixed, 78 p
summary: Let $K$ be a field of characteristic zero, let $A_1=K[x][\partial ]$ be the first Weyl algebra. In this paper we prove that the Dixmier conjecture for the first Weyl algebra is true, i.e. each algebra endomorphism of the algebra $A_1$ is an automorphism.

AI.tldr: 证明了第一Weyl代数的Dixmier猜想：该代数的每个代数自同态都是自同构
AI.motivation: Dixmier猜想是第一Weyl代数中的一个重要未解决问题，涉及代数自同态的性质。该猜想断言该代数的每个代数自同态都是自同构，这在代数几何和表示论中具有重要意义。
AI.method: 在特征零域上研究第一Weyl代数A₁=K[x][∂]，通过代数方法证明每个代数自同态都是自同构。可能涉及多项式环和微分算子的结构分析。
AI.result: 成功证明了Dixmier猜想对于第一Weyl代数成立，即A₁的每个代数自同态都是自同构。
AI.conclusion: 第一Weyl代数的Dixmier猜想在特征零域上成立，这为相关代数结构的研究提供了重要理论基础。

title: Abelian gauge-like groups of $L_\infty$-algebras
comment: The article is withdrawn because the main result is incorrect
summary: Given a finite type degree-wise nilpotent $L_\infty$-algebra, we construct an abelian group that acts on the set of Maurer-Cartan elements of the given $L_\infty$-algebra so that the quotient by this action becomes the moduli space of equivalence classes of Maurer-Cartan elements. Specializing this to degree-wise nilpotent dg Lie algebras, we find that the associated ordinary gauge group of the dg Lie algebra with the Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff multiplication might be substituted by the underlying additive group. This additive group acts on the Maurer-Cartan elements, and the quotient by this action yields the moduli space of gauge-equivalence classes of Maurer-Cartan elements.

AI.tldr: 本文为有限型逐次幂零L∞代数构造了一个阿贝尔群，该群作用于Maurer-Cartan元素集合，使得商空间成为Maurer-Cartan元素等价类的模空间。
AI.motivation: 研究L∞代数中Maurer-Cartan元素的模空间构造问题，特别是如何通过群作用来刻画等价类，这对于理解形变理论和同伦代数结构具有重要意义。
AI.method: 为有限型逐次幂零L∞代数构造了一个阿贝尔群，该群作用于Maurer-Cartan元素集合。对于微分分次李代数的情况，用Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff乘法的普通规范群可以被底层加法群替代。
AI.result: 成功构造了一个阿贝尔群作用，使得商空间精确对应于Maurer-Cartan元素的等价类模空间。对于微分分次李代数，证明了加法群作用与规范等价关系的一致性。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一种新的方法来构造L∞代数中Maurer-Cartan元素的模空间，通过阿贝尔群作用简化了等价关系的描述，特别在微分分次李代数情况下提供了更简洁的群作用框架。
